record.description: These University of Chicago men, who with six Northwestern men will escort twelve Hollywood beauties from Warner Brothers' "Gold diggers of 1937" when they arrive here today (Thursday), are scanning the skies for the American Airlines plane on which the girls are touring the United States. The twelve girls from the coast will be met by the State Street Council’s choice of twelve Chicago beauties. The six men pictured here are, first row, left to right: Wilbur Jerger, Samuel Whitside, and Robert Fitzgerald; second row: Omar Fareed, Robert Bethke, and Ned Bartlett.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
record.noteGeneral: Caption attached.From the State Street Council. 209 South State Street. Press release Thursday, November 19, 1936.
